# function: manifest_encode

Given an object representation of a Kubernetes manifest, will encode and return a YAML string for that resource.



## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
manifest_encode(manifest dynamic, validate bool...) string
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `manifest` (Dynamic) The object representation of a Kubernetes manifest
<!-- variadic argument generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `validate` (Variadic, Boolean) Whether to validate the manifest has required Kubernetes fields (apiVersion, kind, metadata). Defaults to true.
